name: Net Interest Margin (NIM)
formula: (Interest Income - Interest Expense) / Average Earning Assets

name: Liquidity Coverage Ratio (LCR)
formula: High-Quality Liquid Assets / Net Cash Outflows

name: Net Stable Funding Ratio (NSFR)
formula: Available Stable Funding / Required Stable Funding

name: Earnings Per Share (EPS)
formula: (Net Income - Preferred Dividends) / Weighted Average Shares Outstanding

name: Price-to-Earnings Ratio (P/E)
formula: Market Price per Share / Earnings per Share

name: Dividend Yield
formula: Annual Dividends per Share / Price per Share

name: Book Value per Share
formula: (Total Equity - Preferred Equity) / Total Shares Outstanding

name: Customer Acquisition Cost (CAC)
formula: Total Sales & Marketing Cost / New Customers Acquired

name: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
formula: Average Revenue per Customer × Average Customer Lifespan

name: Cross-Sell Ratio
formula: Number of Products / Number of Customers

name: Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF)
formula: Total Operating Time / Number of Failures

name: Mean Time to Repair (MTTR)
formula: Total Repair Time / Number of Repairs

name: Changeover Time
formula: Time from last good part to first good part

name: Inventory Turnover
formula: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Inventory

name: On-Time Delivery (OTD)
formula: Orders Delivered On Time / Total Orders

name: Same-Store Sales Growth
formula: (Current Period Sales - Prior Period Sales) / Prior Period Sales

name: Units per Transaction (UPT)
formula: Total Units Sold / Number of Transactions

name: Inventory Turn Rate
formula: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Inventory

name: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
formula: Average Purchase Value × Purchase Frequency × Customer Lifespan

name: Emergency Department Wait Time
formula: Average time from arrival to treatment

name: Patient Wait Time
formula: Average time from check-in to provider

name: Operating Room Utilization
formula: Actual Surgery Time / Available OR Time

name: Case Mix Index (CMI)
formula: Sum of DRG Weights / Total Discharges

name: Nurse Turnover Rate
formula: Nurses Who Left / Average Nurse Headcount

name: Monthly Recurring Revenue (MRR)
formula: Sum of all monthly subscription revenue

name: Net Revenue Retention (NRR)
formula: (Beginning MRR + Expansion - Contraction - Churn) / Beginning MRR

name: Customer Lifetime Value (LTV)
formula: ARPU × Gross Margin × Average Customer Lifetime

name: LTV to CAC Ratio
formula: Customer Lifetime Value / Customer Acquisition Cost

name: DAU/MAU Ratio (Stickiness)
formula: Daily Active Users / Monthly Active Users

name: Time to Value (TTV)
formula: Time from signup to first value realization

name: Quick Ratio (SaaS)
formula: (New MRR + Expansion MRR) / (Churned MRR + Contraction MRR)

name: Burn Rate
formula: Monthly Cash Expenses - Monthly Cash Revenue

name: Magic Number
formula: (Current Quarter ARR - Previous Quarter ARR) / Previous Quarter Sales & Marketing Spend

name: Net Dollar Retention
formula: (Starting ARR + Expansion - Contraction - Churn) / Starting ARR

name: Heat Rate
formula: Fuel Energy Input / Electrical Energy Output

name: System Average Interruption Duration Index (SAIDI)
formula: Total Duration of Interruptions / Total Customers

name: System Average Interruption Frequency Index (SAIFI)
formula: Total Number of Interruptions / Total Customers

name: Forced Outage Rate
formula: Forced Outage Hours / (Service Hours + Forced Outage Hours)

name: Cost per kWh
formula: Total Operating Cost / Total kWh Sold

name: Energy Theft Rate
formula: Estimated Stolen Energy / Total Energy Supplied

name: Perfect Order Rate
formula: (On-Time × In-Full × Damage-Free × Accurate) Orders / Total Orders

name: On-Time In-Full (OTIF)
formula: Orders Delivered Complete and On Time / Total Orders

name: Order Cycle Time
formula: Time from Order Placement to Delivery

name: Inventory Turnover
formula: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Inventory Value

name: Days of Supply
formula: Inventory on Hand / Average Daily Usage

name: Stockout Rate
formula: Out of Stock Items / Total SKUs

name: Warehouse Capacity Utilization
formula: Used Storage Space / Total Storage Space

name: Putaway Efficiency
formula: Units Put Away / Putaway Labor Hours

name: Truck Utilization
formula: Used Truck Capacity / Total Truck Capacity

name: Supplier Lead Time
formula: Average time from PO to receipt

name: Supplier On-Time Delivery
formula: On-Time Supplier Deliveries / Total Supplier Deliveries

name: Supplier Defect Rate
formula: Defective Units from Supplier / Total Units Received

name: Purchase Order Cycle Time
formula: Time from PO Creation to PO Approval

name: Cash-to-Cash Cycle Time
formula: Inventory Days + Receivable Days - Payable Days

name: Time to Fill
formula: Days from Job Posting to Offer Acceptance

name: Time to Hire
formula: Days from Application to Offer Acceptance

name: Cost per Hire
formula: Total Recruiting Costs / Number of Hires

name: Labor Cost Percentage
formula: Total Labor Costs / Total Operating Costs

name: Gender Pay Gap
formula: (Male Avg Pay - Female Avg Pay) / Male Avg Pay

name: Sales Cycle Length
formula: Average days from first contact to close

name: Pipeline Value
formula: Sum of all opportunity values in pipeline

name: First Response Time (FRT)
formula: Time from ticket creation to first response

name: Average Handle Time (AHT)
formula: (Talk Time + Hold Time + After Call Work) / Total Calls

name: First Contact Resolution (FCR)
formula: Issues Resolved on First Contact / Total Contacts

name: Average Wait Time
formula: Total Wait Time / Total Calls Answered

name: Service Level
formula: Calls Answered within Target / Total Calls

name: Cash-on-Cash Return
formula: Annual Pre-Tax Cash Flow / Total Cash Invested

name: Internal Rate of Return (IRR)
formula: Discount rate that makes NPV zero

name: Gross Rent Multiplier (GRM)
formula: Property Price / Annual Gross Rental Income

name: Average Lease Term
formula: Sum of Lease Terms / Number of Leases

name: Make-Ready Time
formula: Average days to prepare unit for new tenant

name: Work Order Completion Time
formula: Average time to complete work orders

name: Absorption Rate
formula: Units Sold per Month / Total Available Units

name: Coverage Area
formula: Area with network signal / Total target area

name: Blended ARPU
formula: Weighted average of prepaid and postpaid ARPU

name: First Call Resolution
formula: Issues Resolved on First Call / Total Calls

name: On-Time Completion Rate
formula: Projects Completed On Time / Total Projects

name: On-Budget Completion Rate
formula: Projects Completed On Budget / Total Projects
